name: soled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(used to form adjectives) having soles (= the bottom part of a shoe) of a particular kind: leather-soled shoes Fortunately, we were both wearing rubber-soled boots. See
sole
More examplesFewer examplesYou need a pair of soft-soled shoes which don't slip on the boat. The boots were cracked, dirty, and thin-soled. We were given Japanese wooden-soled shoes and we wore those.
